characters' story is continued in 'Home Rule'.

to rediscover a remarkable Englishman, who changed the way we see the
natural world.

DAILY TELEGRAPH

book_title: Silver Linings: Travels Around Northern Ireland
Summary:

VERMILION GATE tells the story of modern China itself, written from

At the age of 45, Bill Drummond is less concerned with setting the
record straight as making sure it revolves at the correct speed.

book_title: Independence Day:  A Broken Heart's Voyage Around the USA
Summary:
His self-esteem heading south, Jim Keeble decides to follow suit,
hoping that the United States—and the women of America—can help mend

No. I never want to see you again. Following his true love's
rejection by the frozen waters of Niagara Falls, the honeymoon capital

Land of the Free.

book_title: Park and Ride: Adventures in Suburbia
Summary:
This is the Britain of motorways and heritage centres, of campaigning

SUMMARY: Relates the joys and sorrows of adolescence as experienced by
a young girl growing up in a boys' boarding school.

book_title: Forest of Memories:  Tales from the Heart of Africa
Summary:

book_title: Faintheart:  An Englishman Ventures North of the Border
Summary:
Stomping the quintessential Highlands from Inverness to Skye and
risking frozen extremities to reach breathtaking Hebridean islands,
Charles Jennings discovers a land of awe-inspiring beauty.

Dogs tucked into handbags, verbally polluted airline companions,

xenophobic English tourists - these are just a few of Peter
Biddlecombe's least favourite things.

book_title: Continental drifter: Taking the low road with the first grand tourist
Summary:
Tim Moore retraces the Jacobean hero's footsteps - in a Rolls

Rich Hall plumps up the cushions, sets out a few drinks and invites us

Patrick Browning and Anne Fitzgerald are both young historians, and

One day in the desert, Veronica Smiles, professional explorer, meets

book_title: The Hand of Amun (Black Lace Series)

As Vesuvius erupts and covers Pompeii, Marcella and her lover Gaius

separated.

wife and mother.

As the Unhallowed Rites unfold, Allegra undergoes bizarre ceremonies

When Kate finds her two flatmates in bed together, Joe is mortified.
Then Sean challenges her to join in, and Kate soon becomes hooked on
their menage a trois. But can the three lovers live happily ever after
- together?"

In 1917, war-torn Russia is teetering on the brink of the Revolution,

Rianna is offered as a gesture of peace to Sarin, the overlord of the

book_title: Cooking Up a Storm (Black Lace Series)
Summary:
